body: Dear Anush Jain, Congratulation you have been shortlisted for the next round for OceanAI and you need to schedule the interview for the same, Reply the free slots for interview to this mail.

subject: Free 500$ gift card
body: Dear Anush Jain, Congatulation you have been selected by our foundation to recieve 500$ in your bank account to claim this you have to share your bank details to this email kindly click the link http://giftcard.com attached before it get expire.
